001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004
005import java.io.File;
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.time.LocalDateTime;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Set;
010
011import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
012import static org.hamcrest.core.IsEqual.equalTo;
013import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows;
014
015public class SubmitTest {
016
017  @Test
018  public void nineDigitStringIsInvalidLoginId() {
019    Submit submit = new Submit();
020    assertThat(submit.isNineDigitStudentId("123456789"), equalTo(true));
021  }
022
023  @Test
024  public void eightDigitStringIsValidLoginId() {
025    Submit submit = new Submit();
026    assertThat(submit.isNineDigitStudentId("12345678"), equalTo(false));
027  }
028
029  @Test
030  public void userNameIsValidLoginId() {
031    Submit submit = new Submit();
032    assertThat(submit.isNineDigitStudentId("whitlock"), equalTo(false));
033  }
034
035  @Test
036  public void emailAddressIsInvalidLoginId() {
037    Submit submit = new Submit();
038    assertThat(submit.looksLikeAnEmailAddress("me@email.com"), equalTo(true));
039  }
040
041  @Test
042  public void canSubmitClassesInStudentPackage() {
043    String userId = "student";
044
045    File file = makeFileWithPath("src", "main", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId, "ProjectClass.java");
046    Submit submit = new Submit();
047    submit.setUserId(userId);
048    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(true));
049  }
050
051  private File makeFileWithPath(String... path) {
052    File dir = new File(System.getProperty("user.dir"));
053
054    for (String part : path) {
055      dir = new File(dir, part);
056    }
057
058    return dir;
059  }
060
061  @Test
062  public void canSubmitClassesInSubPackage() {
063    String userId = "student";
064
065    File file = makeFileWithPath("src", "main", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId, "subpackage", "ProjectClass.java");
066    Submit submit = new Submit();
067    submit.setUserId(userId);
068    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(true));
069  }
070
071  @Test
072  public void submissionTimeIsInIsoDateTime() {
073    LocalDateTime time = LocalDateTime.of(2018, 7, 8, 5, 59, 32);
074    String formattedTime = Submit.ManifestAttributes.formatSubmissionTime(time);
075    assertThat(formattedTime, equalTo("2018-07-08T05:59:32"));
076  }
077
078  @Test
079  public void legacySubmissionTimeCanBeParsed() {
080    String legacySubmissionTime = "2018-Jul-08 05:59:32";
081    LocalDateTime expected = LocalDateTime.of(2018, 7, 8, 5, 59, 32);
082
083    LocalDateTime actual = Submit.ManifestAttributes.parseSubmissionTime(legacySubmissionTime);
084    assertThat(actual, equalTo(expected));
085  }
086
087  @Test
088  public void canSubmitTestClasses() {
089    String userId = "student";
090
091    File file = makeFileWithPath("src", "test", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId, "subpackage", "ProjectTest.java");
092    Submit submit = new Submit();
093    submit.setUserId(userId);
094    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(true));
095  }
096
097  @Test
098  public void canSubmitIntegrationTestClasses() {
099    String userId = "student";
100
101    File file = makeFileWithPath("src", "it", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId, "subpackage", "ProjectTest.java");
102    Submit submit = new Submit();
103    submit.setUserId(userId);
104    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(true));
105  }

108  public void canSubmitMainJavaDocPackageHtml() {

110
111    File file = makeFileWithPath("src", "main", "javadoc", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId, "package.html");
112    Submit submit = new Submit();

114    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(true));
115  }
116
117  @Test
118  public void cantSubmitPomXml() {
119    String userId = "student";
120
121    File file = makeFileWithPath("proj", "pom.xml");
122    Submit submit = new Submit();
123    submit.setUserId(userId);
124    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(false));
125  }
126
127  @Test
128  public void cantSubmitJavaFileInGroovyDirectory() {
129    String userId = "student";
130
131    File file = makeFileWithPath("src", "main", "groovy", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId, "Project.java");
132    Submit submit = new Submit();
133    submit.setUserId(userId);
134    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(false));
135  }
136
137  @Test
138  public void zipFileEntryNameForSourceFile() {
139    String entryName = "src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/Project.java";
140    String fileName = "directory" + "/" + entryName;
141    assertThat(Submit.getZipEntryNameFor(fileName), equalTo(entryName));
142  }
143
144  @Test
145  public void zipFileEntryNameForBadSourceFileThrowsException() {
146    String badFileName = "dir/src/bad/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/File.java";
147    assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, () -> Submit.getZipEntryNameFor(badFileName));
148  }
149
150  @Test
151  public void canSubmitPackageHtmlForMainTestAndIT() {
152    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/main/javadoc/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/package.html"), equalTo(true));
153    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/test/javadoc/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/package.html"), equalTo(true));
154    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/it/javadoc/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/package.html"), equalTo(true));
155  }
156
157  private boolean canFileBeSubmitted(String fileName) {
158    return Submit.canFileBeSubmitted(new File(fileName));
159  }
160
161  @Test
162  public void zipFileEntryNameForSourceJavadocFile() {
163    String entryName = "src/main/javadoc/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/package.html";
164    String fileName = "directory" + "/" + entryName;
165    assertThat(Submit.getZipEntryNameFor(fileName), equalTo(entryName));
166  }
167
168  @Test
169  public void canSubmitXmlFilesFromTestResourcesDirectory() {
170    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/test/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.xml"), equalTo(true));
171    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/it/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.xml"), equalTo(true));
172  }
173
174  @Test
175  public void mainResourcesDirectoryIsAnAllowedMavenDirectory() {
176    String userId = "student";
177
178    File file = makeFileWithPath("src", "main", "resources", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId, "testData.xml");
179    Submit submit = new Submit();
180    submit.setUserId(userId);
181    assertThat(submit.isInMavenProjectDirectory(file), equalTo(true));
182  }

204  @Test
205  public void zipFileEntryNameForTestResourcesFile() {
206    String entryName = "src/test/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.xml";

208    assertThat(Submit.getZipEntryNameFor(fileName), equalTo(entryName));

210
211  @Test
212  public void canSubmitTxtFilesFromResourcesDirectory() {
213    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/main/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/text.txt"), equalTo(true));
214    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/test/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.txt"), equalTo(true));
215    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/it/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.txt"), equalTo(true));
216  }
217
218  @Test
219  public void cannotSubmitTxtFilesFromJavaDirectory() {
220    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/main/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/text.txt"), equalTo(false));
221    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/test/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.txt"), equalTo(false));
222    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("src/it/java/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.txt"), equalTo(false));
223  }
224
225  @Test
226  public void canSubmitTxtFilesFromResourcesDirectoryInCodeDirectoryWithJavaInTheName() {
227    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("code/java/checkout/src/main/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/text.txt"), equalTo(true));
228    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("code/java/checkout/src/test/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.txt"), equalTo(true));
229    assertThat(canFileBeSubmitted("code/java/checkout/src/it/resources/edu/pdx/cs410J/student/testData.txt"), equalTo(true));
230  }
231
232  @Test
233  public void testClassesWereSubmitted() {
234    Set files = Set.of(
235      makeFileWithPath("src", "test", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", "student", "StudentTest.java")
236    );
237
238    assertThat(Submit.submittedTestClasses(files), equalTo(true));
239  }
240
241  @Test
242  public void notestClassesWereSubmitted() {
243    Set files = Set.of(
244      makeFileWithPath("src", "main", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", "student", "Student.java")
245    );
246
247    assertThat(Submit.submittedTestClasses(files), equalTo(false));
248  }
249
250  @Test
251  public void canSubmitKoansFile() throws IOException {
252    String[] dirs = {"src", "beginner"};
253    String fileName = "AboutKoans.java";
254
255    assertFileCanBeSubmitted("whitlock", fileName, dirs, true);
256  }
257
258  @Test
259  public void canSubmitProjectFile() throws IOException {
260    String userId = "whitlock";
261    String fileName = "Project1.java";
262    String[] dirs = {"src", "main", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId};
263
264
265    assertFileCanBeSubmitted(userId, fileName, dirs, true);
266  }
267
268  private void assertFileCanBeSubmitted(String userId, String fileName, String[] dirs, boolean canSubmit) throws IOException {
269    File dir = new File(System.getProperty("user.dir"));
270    for (String dirName : dirs) {
271      dir = new File(dir, dirName);
272      dir.mkdirs();
273    }
274
275    File projectFile = new File(dir, fileName);
276    projectFile.createNewFile();
277
278    Submit submit = new Submit();
279    submit.setUserId(userId);
280    assertThat(submit.canBeSubmitted(projectFile), equalTo(canSubmit));
281  }
282
283  @Test
284  public void cannotSubmitFilesWithoutFileExtension() throws IOException {
285    String userId = "whitlock";
286    String fileName = "noExtension";
287    String[] dirs = {"src", "main", "resources", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId};
288
289    assertFileCanBeSubmitted(userId, fileName, dirs, false);
290  }
291
292  @Test
293  public void cannotSubmitFilesOnNoSubmitList() throws IOException {
294    String userId = "whitlock";
295    String fileName = "AbstractAirline.java";
296    String[] dirs = {"src", "main", "java", "edu", "pdx", "cs410J", userId};
297
298    assertFileCanBeSubmitted(userId, fileName, dirs, false);
299  }
300
301  @Test
302  public void invalidProjectNameThrowsIllegalStateException() {
303    Submit submit = new Submit();
304    submit.setProjectName("invalid");
305    assertThrows(IllegalStateException.class, submit::validateProjectName);
306  }
307
308  @Test
309  public void validateProjectName() {
310    List.of("koans", "Project0", "Project4").forEach(
311      projectName -> {
312        Submit submit = new Submit();
313        submit.setProjectName("koans");
314        submit.validateProjectName();
315      }
316    );
317  }
318
319}
